trans-unit.source: Handles events that can occur during the display of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView"></xref> items.
trans-unit.target: 處理期間的顯示可能發生的事件<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: A view is usually composed of various loosely coupled visual components.
trans-unit.target: 檢視通常包含各種鬆散耦合的視覺化元件。

trans-unit.source: Registers the custom controls that are viewed during execution of a composite application.
trans-unit.target: 註冊在複合應用程式執行期間所檢視的自訂控制項。

trans-unit.source: Registration of view components into a virtual table provides developers with a concise way to handle custom controls in a composite application.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬資料表的檢視元件的註冊提供開發人員運用簡明的方式來處理在複合應用程式中的自訂控制項。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the custom controls to be registered.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含要註冊之自訂控制項。

trans-unit.source: Registers the default controls that are viewed during execution of a composite application.
trans-unit.target: 註冊在複合應用程式執行期間所檢視的預設控制項。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the default controls to be registered.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含要註冊之預設控制項。

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the custom controls that are viewed during execution of a composite application.
trans-unit.target: 移除註冊在複合應用程式執行期間所檢視的自訂控制項。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the custom controls to be unregistered.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含要移除註冊之自訂控制項。

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the default controls that are viewed during execution of a composite application.
trans-unit.target: 移除註冊在複合應用程式執行期間所檢視的預設控制項。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the default controls to be unregistered.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含要移除註冊之預設控制項。
